Ability Capsule.effect: A consumable item that allows a Pokémon to switch the non-hidden ability it knows (if two options are available).

Air Balloon.effect: Pokémon that holds this is immune to ground-type moves. Pops when holder is hit by an attack.

Arceus Plate.effect: Changes the typing of Arceus and the move "Judgement"

Aspear Berry.effect: Cures freeze. Activated when a Pokémon becomes frozen

Assault Vest.effect: Pokémon that hold this gain +1 to their AC, but can only use damaging moves.

Babiri Berry.effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a steel-type move. Activates when damaged by a steel-type move.

Big Root.effect: HP stealing moves restore an additional 1d12 HP (without additional damage to the target).

Black Belt.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to damage from fighting-type moves (once per move).

Black Glasses.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to damage from dark-type moves (once per move).

Black Sludge.effect: Restores hp equal to the holder's prof. bonus to poison types at the end of each of their turns. Damages non-poison types for the same amount instead of healing.

Charcoal.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to damage from fire-type moves (once per move).

Charti Berry.effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a rock-type move. Activates when damaged by a rock-type move.

Cheri Berry.effect: Cures paralysis. Activated when a Pokémon becomes paralyzed

Chesto Berry.effect: Wakes from sleep. Activated when a Pokémon falls asleep

Chilan Berry.effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a normal-type move. Activates when damaged by a normal-type move.

Chople Berry.effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a fighting-type move. Activates when damaged by a fighting-type move.

Coba Berry.effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a flying-type move. Activates when damaged by a flying-type move.

Colbur Berry.effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a dark-type move. Activates when damaged by a dark-type move.

DNA Splicer.effect: Allows Kyerum to fuse into Black or White form.

Damp Rock.effect: Holder increases the duration of their Rain Dance move by 3 rounds.

Deep Sea Scale.effect: While a Clamperl holds this, their AC is increased by 1

Deep Sea Tooth.effect: While a Clamperl holds this, their STAB increases by 1

Dragon Fang.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to damage from dragon-type moves (once per move).

Eject Button.effect: When hit by an attack, holder may switch out as a free action

Flame Orb.effect: While held, this orb inflicts the burn status at the end of every turn.

Focus Band.effect: Roll a d20 when suffering from the flinched status. On a 10 or higher, you do not flinch.

Genesect Drive.effect: Casettes that change the typing of Genesect's move "Techo Blast"

Gracidea Flower.effect: A beautiful flower that allows Shaymin to change forms.

Grepa Berry.effect: Permanently lowers Pokémon WIS score by 2, but raises Loyalty by 1.

Griseous Orb.effect: Allows Girantina to switch forms. Its Dragon and Ghost moves double STAB bonus.

Haban Berry.effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a dragon-type move. Activates when damaged by a dragon-type move.

Hard Stone.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to damage from rock-type moves (once per move).

Heat Rock.effect: Holder increases the duration of their Sunny Day move by 3 rounds.

Hondew Berry.effect: Permanently lowers Pokémon DEX score by 2, but raises Loyalty by 1.

Icy Rock.effect: Holder increases the duration of their Hail move by 3 rounds.

Kasib Berry.effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a ghost-type move. Activates when damaged by a ghost-type move.

Kebia Berry.effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a poison-type move. Activates when damaged by a poison-type move.

Kelpsy Berry.effect: Permanently lowers Pokémon STR score by 2, but raises Loyalty by 1.

King\u0027s Rock.effect: On natural attack rolls of 19 or 20, the target flinches.

Leftovers.effect: Restores HP equal to the holder's proficiency bonus at the end of each of their turns.

Leppa Berry.effect: Restores 10 PP to a move. Activated when Pokémon runs out of PP for a move.

Life Orb.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to its damage rolls, but takes the same amount in damage to itself.

Light Ball.effect: Raises Pikachu's MOVE power modifier by +1

Lucky Egg.effect: XP from battle for this Pokémon is increased by 20%

Lucky Punch.effect: Increases Chansey's critical hit range by 1 (20 to 19+, etc.).

Lum Berry.effect: Cures any negative status effect. Activated when Pokémon is affected with status.

Magnet.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to damage from electric-type moves (once per move).

Megalite.effect: Allows a final-stage Pokémon to "Mega Evolve"

Metal Coat.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to damage from steel-type moves (once per move).

Metal Powder.effect: When held by Ditto, its CON score increases by +3

Miracle Seed.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to damage from grass-type moves (once per move).

Mystic Water.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to damage from water-type moves (once per move).

N-Lunarizer.effect: Allows Necrozma to fuse with Lunala to create Dusk Mane Necrozma|N/A|

N-Solarizer.effect: Allows Necrozma to fuse with Solgaleo to create Dark Wings Necrozma

NeverMelt Ice.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to damage from ice-type moves (once per move).

Occa Berry.effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a fire-type move. Activates when damaged by a fire-type move.

Oran Berry.effect: Restores 2d4+2 HP. Activated when Pokémon drops below 50% HP.

Passho Berry.effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a water-type move. Activates when damaged by a water-type move.

Payapa Berry.effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a psychic-type move. Activates when damaged by a psychic-type move.

Pecha Berry.effect: Cures poison. Activated when a Pokémon becomes poisoned

Persim Berry.effect: Cures confusion. Activated when Pokémon becomes confused.

Poison Barb.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to damage from poison-type moves (once per move).

Polkadot Bow.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to damage from fairy-type moves (once per move).

Pomeg Berry.effect: Permanently lowers Pokémon CON score by 2, but raises Loyalty by 1.

Qualot Berry.effect: Permanently lowers Pokémon AC by 2, but raises Loyalty by 1.

Quick Claw.effect: Increase initiative roll by +3 while this Pokémon is active.

Rawst Berry.effect: Cures burn. Activated when a Pokémon becomes burned

Razor Claw.effect: Increases critical hit range by 1 (20 to 19+, etc.)

Razz Berry.effect: When held by an active Pokémon, trainer gains +1 to catching attempts.

Reveal Glass.effect: Allows Thundurus, Landorus, and Tornadus to change forms

Rindo Berry.effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a grass-type move. Activates when damaged by a grass-type move.

Roseli Berry.effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a fairy-type move. Activates when damaged by a fairy-type move.

Scope Lens.effect: Increases critical hit range by 1 (20 to 19+, etc.)

Sharp Beak.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to damage from flying-type moves.

Shell Bell.effect: Restores HP = prof. bonus after activating a move that damages at least one creature.

Shuca Berry.effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a ground-type move. Activates when damaged by a ground-type move.

Silk Scarf.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to damage from normal-type moves (once per move).

Silver Powder.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to damage from bug-type moves (once per move).

Sitrus Berry.effect: Restores 30 HP. Activated when Pokémon drops below 50% HP.

Smoke Ball.effect: Guarantees a success in an attempt to flee from wild Pokémon battles.

Smooth Rock.effect: Holder increases the duration of their Sandstorm move by 3 rounds.

Soft Sand.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to damage from ground-type moves (once per move).

Soothe Bell.effect: Resets the Loyalty rating of a Pokémon to +0.

Spell Tag.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to damage from ghost-type moves (once per move).

Stick.effect: Increases Farfetch's critical hit range by 1 (20 to 19+, etc.).

Tanga Berry.effect: Pokémon takes half damage from a bug-type move. Activates when damaged by a bug-type move.

Thick Club.effect: Doubles the STAB bonus of Cubone or Marowak's moves.

Tomato Berry.effect: Permanently lowers Pokémon speed by 10, but raises Loyalty by 1.

Toxic Orb.effect: While held, this orb inflicts the poison status at the end of every turn.

Twisted Spoon.effect: Holder adds prof. bonus to damage from psychic-type moves (once per move).

Wacan Berry.effect: Pokémon takes half damage from an electric-type move. Activates when damaged by a electric-type move.

Wide Lens.effect: Holder gains +1 to all attack rolls.

Yache Berry.effect: Pokémon takes half damage from an ice-type move. Activates when damaged by a ice-type move.
